description.p: reach up and run your hand over the top of your head. do you feel hair? do you feel skin? do you feel cloth? this is a part of you which you cannot ignore. inhale, and suck the air into your lungs. the capilaries that press against the surface of those air sacks were grown by your body some time ago. exhale. thank yourself for continuing to function.

you were made long ago, but not too long ago. countless smaller organisms touch your body at all times, forming an ecosystem unique to your chemistry, your experiences, your history. every other body you've brushed past with your own will exchange some of this ecosystem. how do you justify separating yourself as a singular entity, discrete from all others?
relax. we're all in this together.
